mapper.select: SELECT LicDomain , LicUserCount , LicExpireDate , LieExUserCount , LicEx1Date , ChargerEmail FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_domain WHERE IsUse = 'Y' AND DomainID = #{domainID}

SELECT LicDomain , odl.LicUserCount , odl.LicExpireDate , odl.LicExUserCount , odl.LicEx1Date , ChargerEmail FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_domain od JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_domain_license odl on od.domainid = odl.domainid WHERE IsUse = 'Y' AND od.DomainID = #{domainID} AND odl.LicSeq = #{licSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_license_opt_user (LicSeq, DomainID, UserCode, RegisterCode, RegistDate) VALUES (#{licSeq}, #{domainId}, #{userCode}, #{registerCode}, now())
mapper.select:
SELECT CONCAT(t1.DisplayName, ' / ', t1.DomainCode) AS DisplayName , '-' AS IsOpt , '-' AS LicName , t2.ServiceEnd , IFNULL(t2.ServiceUser, 0) AS ServiceUser , t2.ExtraExpiredate , IFNULL(t2.ExtraServiceUser, 0) AS ExtraServiceUser , '0' AS LicUsingCnt , '0' AS RemainCnt , '' AS OverYN FROM sys_object_domain t1 LEFT JOIN sys_object_domain_license t2 on t2.domainid = t1.domainid WHERE t2.LicSeq is null
AND t1.DisplayName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{selectsearch},'%')
